about_the_game:
The Way Home is a Metroidvania 2D platformer where you play as a raccoon, separated from his family, who must flee from a raging forest fire. Explore the vast and beautiful woodland, find hidden secrets and collect useful items, and avoid dangerous enemies and obstacles. Use your agility, cunning, and special abilities to survive and escape!

Features:

  • A large and detailed map with different biomes, such as forests, lakes, caves, and mountains.
  • A variety of items and abilities to find and use, such as climbing, digging claws, booty drops, etc.
  • A dynamic fire system that spreads across the map and changes the environment.
  • A charming 2.5D art style with smooth animations and atmospheric music.
  • A story mode with cutscenes and dialogue that reveals Rocky's backstory and personality.

If you love Metroidvania games with cute animals and challenging gameplay, The Way Home is the game for you!
